TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindingMemberInfo extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: 包含信息，使 可以将数据绑定解析为某对象的属性或对象列表中当前对象的属性。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> 由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingMemberInfo%2A>类的属性返回。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>
是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>从传递<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A>给构造函数的字符串创建的。
## Examples 下面的代码示例将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>为窗<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>体上的每个控件打印。
[!code-cpp[Classic BindingMemberInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingMemberInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingMemberInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: BindingMemberInfo(System::String ^ dataMember);

Docs.param: 解析为某对象的属性或对象列表中当前对象的属性的导航路径。
Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用控件属性名称、数据源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A>和导航路径调用构造函数时, 将自动创建。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> `dataMember` 参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>包含字符串。

MemberSignature.Value: public string BindingField { get; }
.property instance string BindingField
Public ReadOnly Property BindingField As String
public: property System::String ^ BindingField { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.BindingField : string

Docs.summary: 获取数据绑定对象的属性名。
Docs.value: 数据绑定对象的属性名。 这可以是一个空字符串 ("")。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>是在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>由属性返回的导航路径中找到的最后一项。 例如, 如果创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> `dataMember`了一个包含参数 "custToOrders" 的新的, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>将返回 "订货日期"。
## Examples 下面的代码示例获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>窗体上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>每个的, 并打印的、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>。
[!code-cpp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string BindingMember { get; }
.property instance string BindingMember
Public ReadOnly Property BindingMember As String
public: property System::String ^ BindingMember { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.BindingMember : string

Docs.summary: 获取用于指定数据绑定对象的属性名的信息。
Docs.value: 解析为最终数据绑定对象的属性名的空字符串 ("")、单个属性名或句点分隔的属性名层次结构。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当使用控件属性名称、数据源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A>和导航路径调用构造函数时, 将自动创建。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> `dataMember` 参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>包含字符串。
是用句点分隔的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>值的组合。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> 例如, 通过`dataMember`使用参数 " <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> custToOrders" 创建新的时, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>将返回 "custToOrders" 的参数。
## Examples 下面的代码示例获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>窗体上每<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>个的对象, 并输出的、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>。
[!code-cpp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

member this.BindingPath : string

Docs.summary: 获取数据绑定对象的属性名之前的属性名或句点分隔的属性名层次结构。
Docs.value: 数据绑定对象属性名之前的属性名或句点分隔的属性名层次结构。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是在由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性返回的导航路径中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>之前的属性名组合。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A> 例如, 当创建一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> `dataMember`具有 "custToOrders" 参数的新时, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>将返回 "custToOrders"。
## Examples 下面的代码示例获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>窗体上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>每个的, 并打印的、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>。
[!code-cpp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
